page.title: 07ONE SATURDAY
page.content: When I wake up I shut my door because my parents like to lie in. I play with my "Transformers" until my mum calls me down for a snack. I play with my favourite games," Chukie Egg 2" and "Mr.Do." I get dressed and phone my friend to see if he is playing. We play "Transformers" and then I have a cooked breakfast.I get my swimming pool out.We use the hot and cold taps. I hold one hose pipe and my sister the other, the we have dinner before going to town. We pass two pubs.When we get to town I buy something while my mum buys all the food. Then we go home and Matthew comes to play with me. We have tea and play tennis before I go to bed. Mark Southern age 10. Edited by Neil Crowther age 10.
